content.detailedDescription: My buddy had just traded his plow truck for a green 95 ford f150 4x4. later that night we decided that we would test the 4 wheel drive in it on his property, besides, noone else was home so we were pretty bored. we ended up going to the ridge cause its close, (we didnt want to go far because we didnt have much fuel and didnt know if it would break down). now up here in the winter its dark by 430pm, and it was roughly 630 when we got up there. my bud left the truck running cause it was cold and he shut off the lights so only the parking lights were on, but we were talkin and i had just finished my smoke, while my buddy was just lighting one, and as i threw the ciggerette out of the truck somthing caught my eye. it was to the right of the truck about 100 yards, and it was kinda shiny and just the corners were lit up on it. it was in the shape of a triangle, maybe 40 foot off the tops of the pines. but as i was just about to ask my friend what he thought it was the tops of the pines lit up about 100 feet from us, so my friend shut the truck off including the parking lights in seconds flat cause  something was on the ground with a light and it was looking for something. it scaned the ground for 5 mins then the lights went away, but just as fast as it went away it came back and started to search around again. but this time the lights were brighter and closer. we sat and watched quietly, for another 10 mins and to be honest i was scared *(word removed--cms/sg) and im a good sized guy. i know that it wasnt a chopper cause they fly over head all the time, this was dead silent. the only thing that we heard was a low frequency hum.........Thats it. well  it seemed like the lights kept gettin brighter like they were gettin closer so i told my buddy we needed to get the hell out of there. but even after he started the truck and turn around it was still there, searching for something like it didnt care that we were there. it could have been up there for hours after we left. all i know is there is only one way in and there is no possible way to get a truck in were we saw these lights. i thought at first maybe some one had a wheeler up there but its posted property......And no sounds, not even the sound of someone walking which there was something walking around cause we could see its light. this was a very intense situation. i know people get all freeked out when they see things in the sky, but how would they react if that something was out of the ship walkin around by them????
content.summary: The object had a being on the ground searching for something

content.detailedDescription: I do have picture that looks like an et might be in the corner of the picture but i will not post it online you can contact me and i can text it to you.  it was a blueish disk with about * orange lights around it wasnt sure what i was looking at at first when i took the pic it flashed bright blue and weas gone almost instantly and made no sound but like a hum you could feel in your body
content.summary: Was looking out car window when it was hovering in corn feild took pic and it went strait up

content.detailedDescription:
Surf fishing at topsail beach, nc approximatley 8 pm.
saw orange globe that was thought to be the moon over the ocean.
then looked up again and saw orange object along with the moon.
object appeared to slowly move north and then split into four smaller objects and then appeared to move slowly north until it disappeared behind the clouds.
content.summary: Bright orange globe that split into four

content.detailedDescription: I was on my way home from work in the summer last year 2009 i think it was august. i was watching a bright light in the sky for a couple minutes, and i thought i would take a picture with my cell phone out of my car window. this photo is not the sun!! it is the bright light i saw that day. the school on the left is by my house. i don't remember much about the incicdent except it was a bright light. after looking at it more closley it looks like a typical saucer shape. my phone is just a regular cell phone nothing special about it. i have seen this type of ufo before typical saucer shape except it was horizontal not like this photo and it wasn't shining like this one. it was just old looking metal, hovering over the intersection in broad daylight, my son saw it too, he was in the passenger seat of the car. this picture is straight off my cell phone of the bright light i saw. it looks like it was about to take off. i had to turn on another street so i lost it.
content.summary: Bright light

content.detailedDescription:
I am relating now what i saw and have wondered about all of my life: this was in 1955. i was almost 5 years old outside playing in the yard on a sunny clear day. my mother and my aunt were both sitting outside at a folding card table having coffee and (deep) conversation. seemingly out of nowhere, a gray torpedo or bullet shaped object came moving thru my yard in an easterly direction. it was about 3 feet long and 1' in diameter. something intelligent was obviously directing its movement. it was about 2 feet off the ground, traveling about 3 or 4 mph at most. i saw it and gave chase. i had no idea what this was; i just wanted to catch it. when i would catch up to it and reach out to touch it, it would move just out of my reach.It felt like there was a force field around it. i would almost reach it, like inches away and i would fall down, get back up, chase it again  unable to touch it; all the time i seemed to get this message in my head that "you are too young or too small, you can't touch us". of course, when i ran over to try to get my mom and my aunt to look at the object, i was told to not interrupt. so, i was the only real witness to this event as i watched it this ship leave my yard and continue on its way east,crossing the street heading east from the end of my yard, where i stopped. i watched it travel out of site into parking lot where some large trucks were parked.
it was the only ufo i ever saw until a couple months ago. i have seen 4 in the last two months, and 3 in one night. these were very high in the sky. each of these was different. one was like a falling star; it was a constant light just dropping out of the sky straight down. one was a tiny star like point moving, stopping, jumping and disappearing. another was like a star getting very, very bright then disappearing as quickly as it appeared. also, what i saw 55 years ago looks alot like the object reported in sighting 25425; believe it.
content.summary: Bullet shaped ufo similar to sighting # 25425.

content.detailedDescription:
I often stand out in the back yard in the predawn to spot satellites. this morning, i was looking high in the south and noticed 3 faint stars.  then i noticed that 1 of the stars was moving.  i have seen many satellites and this was traveling far too slow, but if it was a plane it was traveling extremely high and fast.  after watching it travel due south for a short time, it flashed with a brilliant white light and went dark.  i continued watching for about 30 seconds and there was a second flash of light like the first, but it had moved off of the course it had been traveling on, a bit to the south-east.  i tried watching more but i lost line of sight from the rooftop.  about a month ago, i spotted the same thing.
probably something military, but i don't know.
content.summary: Unusual lights in sky.

content.detailedDescription:
Well they are here, what can i say, this town is hot. must have concluded my 500th "funny lights" sighting a week ago. they must be victims of pure dictionary definition on the chemistry books to hold such unlimited quantities of uranium nuclear power. i often ask myself, if i had a ufo, then where am i going anyways? the garbage dump pot got too hot and melted into the center of the planet.....Ooo oooo ooo! quick! cover it up with more garbage, no quick spill some more water on it. once dumb germans always dumb germans...I sit on my smoking tanning chair and concluded one thing recently after like my billionth strange sight....The universe is a very old place, but, one the other hand, the universe is a very small place. saint charles is hot, the sad, but happy, but ironic part is that.......Concluding one last statement..The answear is always right there in front of youre face...Behind youre face , youre heart, youre mind, then the physical realm we live in.

sincerely
yeshua blaha (russian for fender guitar) & chris blaha "mary magdalene" (a magallan gps)


merry christmas 

 ps : its ok to put microchips in youre head if its not a knitstitch with a wireless signal from the 1600s "hint hint"
content.summary: Funny you mentioned saint charles

content.detailedDescription: I work as a courier.  after making a drop i spotted what looked like an unusually bright star to the east.  since i was traveling homeward, in an easterly direction, the object stayed within my view for half and hour. i noticed that it was slowly going down on the horizon.  this in my mind precluded it having a natural explanation.  because of its slow movement i felt this wasn't an aircraft.  i also noted that this "aircraft" didn't have any hazard warning lights associated with manmade aircraft.  upon my arrival at my home i took out my field glasses and that is when i noted its oval shape.
content.summary: Glowing object seen hovering in sky, very slowly moving eastward

content.detailedDescription: This occurred in the northern night sky. i was looking at what i thought were two pretty dim stars, when they randomly began getting extremely bright, i stress extremely bright, and began moving east. but how they were moving was weird. they looked as if they were falling out of the sky.. it is fun catching things like this...  they were in my line of sight of about 3-5 min before they ran into the tree line.. it is hard to explain without sounding weird but i was looking out at the sky, as i normally do in anticipation of seeing these objects. when these two what i thought were stars caught my eye. withing about the first 30 seconds of noticing them, their light became so bright. approx. 3 times brighter than 'sirius'. as they were becoming extremely bright they also began to move. it was weird, they looked like they were simply falling.. probably because of the direction i observed this from. so, they were moving east. no sound, it wasn't anything explainable.. about 30 min. after seeing these two, a final third object (i think this may have been "hailey's comet") moving fast but was in my line of sight for about 5 min. this object was heading east from the west. this object kept its 'brightness' , wasn't like the first two.. did anyone else see this? it made me happy. i love seeing these! after the sighting i wanted to see more, its peaceful.
content.shape: Circle,   Diamond,   Egg,   Flash,   Oval,   Sphere
content.summary: Two dim objects became extremly bright, seemed to enlarge and began moving

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving doing some shopping and saw this object in the sky. i thought it was strange so i filmed it from a shopping plaza in austintown, ohio. the video title is the same as the short description on here.It appeared to be an oval shaped fiery object hovering in the southern skies. this happened at around 5:oopm est. i looked at my cell phone time to confirm it. i really didn't know what to make of the object.

i tried to find a closer location to the object but it appeared (can't be positive) to be moving slowly away once i was at the 2nd location of filming. the second location was just a little further down the road at a bigger shopping plaza.

at this point i lost sight of the object in the trees. i again tried to find a 3rd location but the object was no where to be found and there were many trees obstructing the skyline.

i then went back to the original location to see if it was still there, it was not. i do not know what this was. i have gotten several emails already by folks swearing this is a portal to another dimension. not sure what i believe.
content.summary: Strange ufo? uap? fiery object? portal hovering

content.detailedDescription: My friend [first name removed cms/dr] was sitting in the front yard and he noticed a blue/green light flying in the southern sky. [first name removed cms/dr]  first noticed the light was just hanging in the sky and at the same time a plane was flying east to west and passed the light. after the plane passed a few seconds later the light seemed to fall.  [first name removed cms/dr] then called my wife to come see it because he thought it was a plane crashing. when my wife came out the light rose back up to it's previous level. i was called out at this time. we watched the light move back and forth and up and down for about 5 minutes. the light seemed to move in a circular fashion but it is hard to say for sure because of the distance and darkness. [first name removed cms/dr] and myself were kind of excited but [spouse first name removed cms/dr] was a bit spooked. the object eventually dropped out of sight beyond our view.  [first name removed cms/dr] and i both agreed the light seemed to move like a hang glider would but there doesn't seem to be a place for someone to hang glide at that altitude.
content.summary: Blue/green light flying in southern sky

content.detailedDescription: This was the first time i saw the "glowing balls". since this night, i have seen a red luminescent ball, another blue one, and two green ones. i have tried to do a little research online but i have been unable to find anything exactly like these things i have seen. i have seen two in wayne county, tn, two in pensacola, fl, and one just north of nashville, tn in a small town named white house. the glowing balls don't fall at a normal rate as if dropping a tennis ball from a high elevation. these things seem to slowly fall as if they have a small parachute attached. the always fall straight down (no sideways movement). i have only seen them at night. the appear out of nowhere in the middle of the sky and fall to the ground several hundred yards from where i was standing (at the time) beyond the tree line. i would probably just disregard the sightings if i had only experienced this one time, but i have seen these balls 5 times, in 3 different parts of the south eastern us. before i ever saw the glowing balls, i saw several silver objects darting in and out of a large cloud several miles off the ground (basically directly above me). i was at summer camp in 1997 when this happened. someone else actually noticed the objects and brought my attention to them. we watched them for several minutes before the disappeared. i saw these objects in the middle of the day (possibly 2-3 pm).
content.summary: Blue luminescent ball

content.detailedDescription: At aproximatly 122 my wife and i saw a white orb (about the size of a pin), 2 degrees off of a newly created chemtrail. the orb remained in veiw for about two minutes before disappearing. the chemtrail was created at about fl 38-42, there was no clouds at the time. the orb was seen about 10 sec after the aircraft started the chemtrail. we were looking east as the aircraft was moving west to east. the area above where i live in colorado springs has been a state of heavy contrails in the last months. i have also seen other ufo's during the night time in the area. salmat jarin!
content.summary: White orb near recently created chemtrail

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting on the steps looking at the night sky.  i glanced to the east and saw the 4 color flashing lights.  i noticed the object because of the colors and it did not stop flashing.  i knew then it was not a star.  i thought the object oddly colored and grabbed a pair of binoculars to look at the lights it was flashing.

it just kept on flashing the 4 colors and did not appear to have motion.


i am not afraid of the object.  then, i noticed the 3 smaller ones doing the same flashing but spaced far apart from the bigger and brighter one.
now, i am even more curious as 20 minutes pass and a sparkling flare is emitted from one of the objects and evaporates on ground contact.

i did not lose sight of these 4 objects, they stayed in one place all night.  they were even there on monday night in the same place.  i suppose they are they when it starts to get dark.  i will need to look into that.
content.summary: 3 small objects and 1 large object flashing red, blue, green and white lights in eastern sky

content.detailedDescription: On sunday morning nov 21/2010 at 12:20am, i was taking pictures of the full moon with a halo.  i took 5 pictures of the moon.  when i reviewed the pictures in my camera at approximately 12:30a.M. i realized that only one of the pictures had a small bright object near the moon. i enlarged the picture on my camera and realized that the object appeared in many colors (green, blue, red). the following day i developed the picture with the enlarged object and it appeared that there is a disk shape in the middle of the sphere. this object appears to be similar to the event reported on your sight nov 21/ at 8:20pm in florida, when the individual was downloading pictures.  i think the object was a ufo. pictures will be available upon request.
content.summary: I was taking pictures of the full moon with a halo around it.   when i was downloading the pictures i saw a small bright round object which appeared on the left side of the moon.

content.detailedDescription: i was home 2:55am  i got up to take my dogs out .  and i look up, and notice the clouds a couple hrs earier, the sky was clear you could really see the stars, all i know is that it was in a flash of and eye i thought i was seeing things,it lite up and moved into the clouds.The object was fast, and no sound .
content.summary: I saw this circle shape object and i wonder if anyone seen it

content.detailedDescription: I went out on my porch for a cigarette i sat down on my chair and was looking out at my neighborhood because my porch faces the neighborhood i looked up at the trees for minute and saw a object that was blue with a green hint around it vanish within two or three seconds it was cloudy out so it was not a shooting star and it was not a plane because it just vanished into thin air and it was not in the clouds it was really fast i looked down and my neighbor was also outside looking up at the sky just standing there  i was thinking like what the **** was that and i just sat there and finished my cigarette and stared up at the sky for about ten minutes and then went inside it was my second time seeing a object like that and the first time was about a month ago and i didn't think i should report it but then when i saw it again the other night i was like i have to report it i will write again if i see it i would have taken a picture but it was so fast
content.summary: Bluish green very fasr

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside smoking a cigarette watching the sky at 6:00a.M. i was surprized to see some clearing around our house because it had been cloudy and raining earlier. i was standing on the west edge of our patio and out of the corner of my eye i noticed a light about 6:05a.M. i turned and saw a bright white round object in the sky on the west side of our house. it was about the size between a nickel and a quarter. closer to a quarter. it was white and glowing. did not know what it was but i thought it was a ufo. it came from the north and was going south. flying as fast as could be. faster than any jet i've ever seen. it lasted about 6 seconds. i lost sight of it when it went behind our birch tree but could still see some glowing white light and then it was gone. there was no noise at all or any emissions or tails behind it.

the weather was partly clear and partly cloudy in areas and i could also see other stars in the sky.

the object didn't seem to be very high. it was not up with the other stars, in fact it was about maybe 60 to 80 feet above the poplar tree west of our house. it's very hard to judge the distance above because your looking at a vast night sky. but it did seem very low. i kept watching for a few minutes more and then white clouds started to come in.

i was in awe and very shocked to see this. i feel very lucky to of seen the many sightings i've seen over time. our area seems to be very active for what reason, i don't know. i have seen many more sightins in our area also.
content.summary: Saw round bright white object streak across the sky at 6:05 a.M. because i ran to see what time it was.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving back from a friends house. its dark at this time around 735pm. as im driving i see a bright light on the horizon. i watch it for a good ten minutes and it never got dim or changed course(as far as i could tell). i happen to be driving in its direction on albany county rte 208. i even tried to catch its attention per say by flashing the high beams at it from time to time as i got closer. as i neared i started to go through all the possibilties as to what it could be(been involed in two other ufo encounters soo this isnt new to me). at this point im roughly a half mile away from it. as far as i could tell it was around 200-300 feet in altitude. the road starts to bend around to the right. as i come around the bend its on my left hand side. im going roughly 35-40mph. i caught right up to it. as i got really close i could see a smaller flashing light kind of behind the ufo. realized it was a helicopter coming towards it!! i stopped the car parralel with the ufo. now its maybe 600 feet from me. if i were to hold my hand out at arms length it was just a little bigger than my hand. while im doing this im listening. no nosie except for the approaching chopper. i get back in the car and make a phone call the place i work.(i dont own a cell, havent since 05. well im suppiled a company phone. basic model no camera and a restricted call list.) i called one of the people i work with. i needed to have some sort of other human contact at that point because i was starting to kind of "panic". he found it funny untill he heard the fear in my voice. those were his exact words. well back to it, as i got on the phone it started to move to the right. it had a white light shinning out of the back.Appeared to be the back becasue the direction it was moving. it then stopped again, the light switched ends and it started moving  slowly to the left. with in the next 5 seconds the end with the light lite a bit brighter and then shot off soo far the only thing i could see was a faint glimmer of the light in the distance. thats my encounter, havnt been able to sleep or think the same since.  also interesting is that where this happened is only minutes away from the thatchers park moutains. ive seen the same light up on that mountain randomly. now when i go up there to investigate theres no evidence. i can go right to the area where the lights would be and theres nothing but woods. maybe the same ufo, i dont know? i do know that im having a hard time driving now because alls i do is look towards the sky. dangerous ..Lol ..
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: While driving see brightling on horizan, happen to drive to it. then i watch it hover and then take off.

content.detailedDescription:
I went out the backdoor of my work place to partake of a ���class a��� tobacco product.  adults from my class were also outside but they did not notice anything as they were busy talking.  i watch the sky when i go outside, so i noticed the object.  i am a mufon member.

at first i thought it was a bird as it was making slow circles in a north ��� east ��� south ��� west - north pattern, but then the object ���shined��� and looked metallic, so i thought maybe it was a balloon.  then the object would stop, and then would move up and down.  then it started to make circular up and down movements, or make triangular up and down movements.

as the clouds moved, i realized that this object was very high in the air ��� too high for a helicopter, perhaps.  there was no sound and the object appeared to be graceful.  eventually the object moved in a straight line to the south east and went into a cloud.  the cloud was ���wispy/misty��� so it was easy to see through the cloud.  the object continued to move in a south east direction and disappeared.

as the object was moving in a straight line my co-worker came outside and i pointed it out to her.  she could not see it at first because the object was so high in the air, and small, but as she noticed it so did one of the adults (a male) from my class.  he immediately dismissed the object as a balloon, but he had not been watching the object move in directions a balloon probably would not move.

my co-worker watched it for about a minute before it moved through the wispy cloud and vanished.  i wanted to stay outside and watch but needed to return to work.  i thought about it all day, and again today.  i didn���t feel fear, but i was excited to see something different/unusual/���unidentified.���  i guess my emotion was curiosity/mystery.  my reaction was to not take my eye off the object, which i did not; however, the object was so high in the air that i was starting to see double, so i would close one eye to confirm that the object had not split into two.  i did this periodically if i thought i was seeing two objects and it always would remain as one object when i closed one eye.  unfortunately, my trigonometry/geometry blows, so i can���t even guess at a triangulation for distance/elevation.

if you desire to contact me, please use my home and work email address, or the phone number i included.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Silver orb circling and moving up and down.

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were traveling west on i-70 from st. louis to kansas city and were about 50 miles east of columbia when he opened the sunroof of the vehicle and noticed a bright planet.  he asked me what planet that was and after i looked at it a few times (i was driving) i saw that it was moving and too large and bright to be a planet.  it was a very large very bright light and the size of an asprin or a bit larger held at arm's length.  we kept watching it for about 15 minutes, when it changed course or position slightly north, to where i could see a a silver color chevron shaped structure with rounded edges. i realized at that point that it must have been fairly close to us - somewhere between 3,000 and 5,000 ft.  i looked for wings or tail and saw nothing.  as it moved, the white light only appeared on the left side,which would have been the back part of the craft, and partially obscuring the craft. about 15 seconds later it moved behind clouds and was partially visible for a minute, then no longer visible as the clouds got heavier. the object did not move like conventional aircraft and must have been moving slowly in order for us to see it for that length of time. see the drawing attached.
content.summary: Large chevron craft south of i-70

content.detailedDescription:
Traveling eastbound on i-44 in webster groves about 1 mile from the laclede sta. rd. exit, i noticed what i at first thought was a commercial airliner taking off from st. louis international airport flying over and away from the city in the distance. about the relative size of an asprin at arms length, i could make out a few white lights and a red light. the white lights suddenly flared up at the ends of the object and became much brighter and bigger, and it soon became a line of white light made up of smaller white lights that appeared to be quickly coming in my direction. the initial dimmer and smaller lights, if a common airplane, would appear to move slowly even if banking, but this object quite suddenly changed its appearance and now seemed to be not too far away and getting closer fast. i figured it must be a helicopter even though it seemed to change its appearance too quickly to be that either. now appearing to be a line of very bright white lights seemingly made up of at least two or more smaller lights in a row, at least five small red lights appeared in cluster at what appeared to be the top back end of the object as it approached, seemingly like a traffic helicopter might parallel the road but very low, perhaps at 200 to 300 feet up traveling along the outer edge of the westbound lanes of i-44. no structure could be discerned yet, just lights.

the red lights seemed to be changing in a cluster, and the white lights were flickering, and it was getting closer fast, and i had a hard time trying to discern what lighting i was seeing. when the craft was within perhaps 300 feet of me it started to strobe with a white flash that i could not discern the source other than the object. the last of the three pulses was extremely bright and made me blink, like a camera flash went off. after that strobing, there was a single red disk of light closer to me, and a single white disk of light further from me, which were on each side of a structure that appeared to be off-white in color. the "fuselage" that i could see looked like one long cylinder with two cylinders of the same size mounted half-way up the single lower cylinder, the two "side" cylinders half-way fused into the lower cylinder. the disks of light were just on either side above the side cylinders. i could not make out a beginning nor end of the craft, nor see its top. there was a bright white ambient glow at what would seem to be the top of the craft, like looking at light source in fog, but the lower structure of the craft could be clearly discerned. basically, anything below the lights could be seen of the structure, but above the lights was a glow that hid the top structure.

this all happened fairly fast, about 20 seconds, and i was trying to drive on an interstate, there were two cars in lanes to the left front of me. in my frequent glances i could yet see the bottom structure as it passed by me and i was focusing on the area that had the lights, and with the craft moving in the opposite direction of me i couldn't get an overall look at it. it was a very unseasonably warm night, and i rolled my window down when it passed. there were only two cars near me, and none on the other side, so the ambient sound was mostly just the wind blowing by. i have driven by many traffic helicopters and they would easily have been heard in this situation, but there was no indication of any sound coming from the craft.

while i honestly could not depict the craft for several reasons, i could discern what i've related, which is enough for me to think that this was an unconventional craft. i used to make model airplanes as a kid, and while i was looking at the structure as it was passing by, all i could think was that it was like the bottom of the us navy's a-7 corsair. i could definitely see the a solid structure in a configuration that i'm not aware commercial nor military air vehicles have. the way the lights shined was also quite different than conventional aircraft lighting, it's hard to describe. the pulsing that took place when it was closest while in front of me caused me to be partially blinded in those times, and the last one lit up the highway like something was taking our picture, much brighter and wider in what was illuminated on the ground than the traffic light strobes that go off taking a picture of a car violating an intersection's traffic lights. that freaked me out a bit, and it seemed the other two cars traveling with me also let up on the gas as i did when that happened, so it seemed they saw at least that too. i was also a bit freaked out because this location where i first saw this craft was the last location i saw a triangle of white lights fly over me and turn off and back two nights before, november 20th, which i ironically had planned on and did report to mufon after i got home from seeing this one!
content.summary: Silent craft with changing and strobing lights flew low along i-44 westbound

content.altitude: Treetop, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I called my husband from the hospital to tell him the doctor was inducing labor and he should come to the hospital. he told me he and the neighbor were outside watching a strange aircraft over the woods near our housing development. the neighbor and his grandchild were videotaping. my husband came to the hospital where we both stayed with our new baby for the next two nights. on the third night, we came home and i had put the baby down to sleep when my husband came to get me, saying the aircraft was back. we went outside and watched it in the woods behind our house for at least an hour or so. it was trangle shaped with blue lights. it was less from a mile from our house. my husband thinks it was about the size of a large vehicle, but it appeared bigger than that to me. it hovered in the air in an unatural fashion, moving a little bit every now and then, but staying pretty much in the same area. it also appeared to rotate periodically. we did not know what it was, but wondered if it was military aircraft. our neighbor, ex-military, said it was not. my husband said he first noticed it by accident. that first night he saw it, he walked outside to change cars around and glanced up and saw it. we did not think to call the police, because it seemed unlikely they'd be able to do anything about it. we saw this same object every night for the next several days. we would check for it at night and it was there after dark, usually appearing later in the evening, after ten or eleven p.M. and remaining visible until the early hours of the morning. we would check periodically to see if it was still there, then get tired of watching it and go to bed. in the morning it was always gone. on the last night we saw it, we only saw it for about an hour or so. on that night, the moon was especially full and bright and there were a couple clouds in an otherwise clear sky. the object moved in front of the clouds at one point and we could make out its shape more clearly. it had a solid base, grayish in color and looked saucer shaped, which was strange because when we could only see the blue lights, it appeared triangle shaped. we watched as it decended and disappeared into the treeline, appearing to be landing. we have not seen it since. we have sent you the video under seperate cover. feel free to attach it to this page. unfortunately, a young kid took the video so it's not the best quality. hope this helps your investigation.
content.summary: Unusual aircraft seen over wesley chapel every night for a week in 9/2008

content.detailedDescription:
I pulled up to my house with my mom after grocery shopping.We had also just got off work.I saw what appeared to be a long stream of black jet smoke all the way across the sky as far as i could see in all direction's.While we carried the groceries into the house i noticed three large silent helicopters with big bright search lights started to circle the sky.This went on on for a good while.When they seem to have finally cleared the sky and gone away i noticed an object coming from the right of me in the sky.I told my mom to come see it.It flew pretty smooth.It looked triangular in shape,had three giant white lights on the front and a few red one's on the back which appeared clustered in a strange formation.It kept flying lower and lower.Then from behind me i noticed one of the helicopters came back out of no where and started to follow the object.The helicopter flew a little higher.I ran to my back yard to continue to observe as they both disappeared into the night sky.A moment later two giant aircrafts followed secconds apart from one another in the same direction.Now i dont know if they had anything to do with the engaged object but it was definantly strange.

now that being said it could have been a numerous amount of thing's:

a government training operation.
an enemy spy plane.
a stealth fighter.
or what appears to me and i would like to believe was an actual unidentified flying object.

i would like it to go on the record that i served this great nation in the united states marine corps and i can say that ihave never seen an object like that or that type of helicopter.Also this was only witnessed by my mother and my self and have zero photographic evidence to support this claim.
thank you.
content.summary: Triangle shape with big lights

content.detailedDescription:
I was alone out side and looked out toward horizon, saw an object with out lights flying from east to west on north west side of san antonio, tx. it flew very, very slowly and wobbled from side to side. i noticed it in the night sky because it was slightly darker than sky line. it flew to an area that is well lit with flood lights, as it is fly line for commercial planes to and from sa airport. as it arrived to this area very slowly, it suddenly " turned on its lights" bright white and glowing. it hovered there for a minute and then rapidly flew to the north into cloud cover and i could no longer see it. i have seen several odd objects here on the nw side the last 2 weeks. not planes and certainly not helicopters as i have seen them flying around the other " strange objects" recently.
go to : *(link moved to additional evidence section--cms/sg) an you can see odd objects in videos of sa skyline.
content.summary: Came in east on north west side san antonio, tx, disk shape, wobbled left to right traveling slowly, sudddenly bright white, hovered over area, flew rapidly to north

content.detailedDescription: *link moved to additional evidence section--cms/sg.
content.summary: Several blinks ufos, also triangle ufo

content.detailedDescription:
I went shopping at the  mall around(730pm)and at the very top of the mall there is an outdoor garage on the roof so i was really elevated, i saw lights they weren't moving i couldn't stop staring since the nyc oct 13 i have become compelled to start looking up, so as myself, husband, brother in law and children looked up my brother in law said it looks like there's a 4th one when out of no where flashed on another light, totally freaked me out to see that, i was amazed and since then a believer, we went to the mall and shopped we came out about 830 or so and to my amazement they were still there so i'm trying to convince my husband there ufo and then the lights formed a vertical formations all lined up at the same time.. so that was my first sighting.. so i went back with a cam corder i have excellent footage. i have not shared with anyone yet. and have continued to record i also have flashing lights i recorded later in november i have had a few sightings since the first
in november i have been recording..I have really good footage i would love to share!!!
with the world!!!
content.flightPath: Stationary,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Ufo sighting in queens ny since oct 28th

content.detailedDescription: Spotted orbs in sky,strange looking not air craft to high in sky.Stopped then moved off not at high rate of speed,but fast enough to disappear over horizonin3 min. i was in my back yard with my grand daughterand noticed lites move thenstop then move away...Also have pictures
content.summary: Looking n to rt of full moontraveling e to w ,2 lit orbs

content.detailedDescription: While using the bathroom at about 3:00 am i had not turned on the bathroom light yet when i saw four small white orbs in a diamond shaped pattern rise fron the southwest at slightly above ground level and silently travel upward at about a 70 degree angle.  they traveled in unison as if connected but i saw nothing between them.  they rose to a point where my roof overhang caused them to be out of sight.  they traveled silently and in a flat plane and just before i lost sight of them it appeared as if i was looking at their underside.  they were baseball sized and seemed to be about thirty feet away initially and about seventy feet high as the rose in a north west direction.  i saw a single orb very similar to these about three years ago and recently reported it.  in both instances i felt a calm sense about what had just occurred. i then returned to bed as if nothing exciting had happened.
content.summary: While using the bathroom at about 3:00 am i looked out the window and saw four small orbs in a diamond shaped pattern rising from the northwest and silently elevate out of sight

content.detailedDescription: While sitting on my deck at about 11:00 pm i noticed two small white orbs in a treeline about 200 yds. to the east about thirty feet above the ground.  one moved a few feet then dissappeared.  the other remained for a few seconds then dissappeared momentarily then reappeared about 40 yds. way and floated motionlessly near a utility pole.  it then started moving west at about ten miles per hour at about thirty feet high and about 50 ft. from me.  it continued to move west with no sound for about 40 yds then disappeared behind trees.  i was excited for a few seconds but then felt very calm as if nothing had happened.  it was not a bright light, but rather a glow with no spikes of light around it nor any auras or halo.
content.summary: Small white sphere appeared in east then slowly traveled west at about 30 feet high and about fifty feet away.  about the size of a baseball.
